body: @DoujinLover B! Yeah I agree! He would have been better off sticking with the nerdy girl and humiliating the other teacher and the girls WITHOUT the rape! instead she stalked him each loop. His mistake was bagging her BEFORE getting his revenge to determine if he wanted to stay or loop! Cause it caused her to stalk him more then usual! Till the one loop she saw the key and got curious. She figured it all out in her first loop (likely BEFORE he started looping and found the key) and decided like him, she'll find the loop SHE wants....a Loop where he is so deeply in love with her, he'll forget any of the revenge he wants....basically she's forcing the option he should have taken at the start! I view him as a bastard because he bagged her in each loop and did those things! She's right to be pissed and punish him by forcing HER LOVE ROUTE on him LOL!

@Tasi Taking a guess here. She likely figured it out once she went back in time the first time! Her raping the Guy at the end was likely a later "loop" after her first one! I mean it's easy to guess when you caught your BF acting weird, raping other girls after confessing to you and getting together with you especially when he knows the things you like and what to say that he was two timing multiple times (hence what she said at the end). She wanted to assure he'll think of NO other girl but her (I'm guessing she was warped to the point he never got the key, and used different methods to try and bag him since remember, before he would never have the spine to confess or would run she got aggressive! She'll keep trying till she gets a loop where he stays with her and they can have their relationship...and assure if it's ever found out, fix the problem as Yandere do!)
Well... Things going down! The teacher is in trouble i will volunteer myself in that never ending time with the girl.
A fitting ending. She won at the end
The first one already hinted you she's a yandere.
Hahaha that was stupid teacher, the right answer was give your life a sense staying with the fist student... That loved you...
